DOC.brief_summary: This post-marketing surveillance study Japan evaluate safety patient satisfaction GLASH VISTA™ ( bimatoprost cutaneous solution 0.03 % ) treatment hypotrichosis eyelash .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Patient Satisfaction With GLASH VISTA™ ( Bimatoprost 0.03 % ) Treatment Eyelash Hypotrichosis Japan
DOC.criteria: Patients prescribed GLASH VISTA™ clinical setting fill least one prescription GLASH VISTA™ .
